name: Channel Sensitivity
description: This data type defines the channel sensitivity (gain) and the units in which it is measured in a waveform result.

fields.name: Channel Sensitivity
fields.description: This component transmits the nominal value that corresponds to one unit in the waveform data, that is, the effective resolution of the least significant bit of the ADC, and the polarity of the channel.

fields.name: Unit Of Measure Identifier
fields.description: The unit designation for the channel sensitivity. This field is required if the unit of measure description is not present.

fields.name: Unit Of Measure Description
fields.description: The full text name of the unit of measure identifier. This field is required if the unit of measure identifier is not present.

fields.name: Unit Of Measure Coding System
fields.description: Specifies the designated system of units. Refer to HL7 Table 0396 - Coding System in section 2.16.4, "Coding System Table" for suggested values. This field is required if the unit of measure identifier is present.

fields.name: Alternate Unit Of Measure Identifier
fields.description: An alternate units designation for the channel sensitivity.

fields.name: Alternate Unit Of Measure Description
fields.description: The full text name of the alternate unit of measure identifier

fields.name: Alternate Unit Of Measure Coding System
fields.description: Specifies the coding system for the alternate unit of measure. Refer to HL7 Table 0396 - Coding System in section 2.16.4, "Coding System Table" for suggested values.
